Any transactions outside of the platform are against our terms of service and may lead to account restrictions The platform reserves the right to take legal action against any violators
common.studentDescription: I'm here to learn and grow my knowledge, and experience in the medical field.
common.traineeDescription: I'm gaining hands-on experience and building practical skills in medicine.
common.expertDescription: I'm looking to teach, mentor, and share my expertise with others in the medical community.
common.researcherDescription: I'm an experienced professional looking to expand my knowledge in the medical field.

auth.preRegisterDescription: Join the biggest community of experts and learners, share your knowledge and learn from others all over the world.

hero.title: Forget the old rules. Learn skills from the best experts. Now. Here.
hero.description: Find opportunities for every stage of your career, control when, where and how you work, and explore additional income opportunities.

experts.title: Discover our best experts
experts.description: Discover a world-class community of professionals who are redefining the way skills are shared. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to take your game to the next level, our experts are here to guide you.

specialized.description: our platform empowers you to elevate your medical expertise. Dive into cutting-edge courses and stay ahead in the ever-evolving world of healthcare. Unlock your potential and make a lasting impact on patient care.
specialized.firstDescription: Showcase your expertise by posting your skills and services on our platform, making it easy for learners to find you.
specialized.secondDescription: Connect with students and other professionals effortlessly through our user-friendly messaging and scheduling tools.
specialized.thirdDescription: Enjoy hassle-free transactions with our secure payment system, ensuring you get paid promptly for your services.
specialized.fourthDescription: Establish direct contracts with learners, allowing for clear agreements and tailored learning experiences.

contact.title: Contact the best experts now
contact.description: We have many medical organizations that provide educational lessons and specialized workshops in various medical areas. Just let us know what you need, and we will make it available for you

colleges.title: Discover experts in all colleges and fields
colleges.description: Connect with leading experts across various disciplines and colleges. Select a college to dive into a curated list of professionals who excel in their fields.

actions.digitalOnlineCoursesDescription: We have many medical organizations that provide educational lessons and specialized workshops in various medical areas. Just let us know what you need, and we will make it lavailable for you
actions.agenciesHiringDescriptionOne: Select the field or skill you need.
actions.agenciesHiringDescriptionTwo: We find the right expert for you.
actions.agenciesHiringDescriptionThree: We coordinate travel and accommodation (if needed).
actions.agenciesHiringDescriptionFour: The expert arrives at your location to provide the required consultation or training.

explore.title: World-class training of trainees through expert guidance
explore.description: We connect trainees with a diverse network of experienced professionals across a variety of disciplines. Benefit from personalized mentoring and insights to enhance your skills and confidence in the medical field. Join us to unleash your potential today!

testimonials.title: What our students say!
testimonials.description: Read testimonials from students who gained valuable skills, insights and connections from our experts.

articles.uploadDescription: This is your chance to make a difference in the world. Share your article to reach a wide audience of researchers and enthusiasts, and leave your mark on the scientific world.

1.title: Top Search Ranking
1.description: Your profile will be ranked #1 in search results for patients and trainees

2.title: 24/7 Visibility Priority
2.description: Your profile appears in search results hourly, every day, for trainees, patients and online consultants

3.title: Online medical consultation
3.description: priority in appearing on the home page daily, displaying, providing easy online consultations with patients and students.

4.title: Enhanced Rating System
4.description: your profile will start by 4 golden stars as a mark of distinction and credibility

5.title: Reduced Platform Fee
5.description: Only 7.5% platform fee instead of standard 10%

6.title: Priority Support
6.description: Get faster response times and dedicated support channel

7.title: Annual Conference Access
7.description: The top 100 doctors on the platform will receive free conference attendance and exclusive job opportunities.

premium.congratulationsDescription: You have successfully upgraded to premium. You can now enjoy all the features of the platform.
premium.isPremium: You are currently on the premium plan!

terms.section1Point1: Definition of the platform's purpose (connecting fresh and new doctors with expert medical workers for compensated learning).
terms.section1Point2: The scope of services provided (online courses, mentorship, skill development).
terms.section1Point3: User eligibility criteria (medical students, young doctors, specialists, and instructors).
terms.section2Point1: Adherence to ethical and professional behavior while using the platform.
terms.section2Point2: Respect for instructors, mentors, and other students.
terms.section2Point3: Proper use of provided educational materials (no redistribution or unauthorized sharing).
terms.section3Point1: Details on subscription plans, pricing, and payment methods.
terms.section4Point1: Criteria for becoming an instructor or mentor.
terms.section4Point2: Code of conduct and professional standards.
terms.section4Point3: Revenue-sharing model or payment terms for instructors.
terms.section5Point1: Ownership rights of the educational content.
terms.section5Point2: Restrictions on copying, modifying, or reselling materials.
terms.section5Point3: Policies on user-generated content (e.g., discussions, assignments).
terms.section6Point1: How user data is collected, stored, and used.
terms.section6Point2: Security measures in place for protecting user information.
terms.section6Point3: User rights regarding their data (e.g., opt-out, data deletion requests).
terms.section7Point1: Prohibited actions (e.g., cheating, harassment, inappropriate conduct).
terms.section7Point2: Disciplinary actions for violating rules (e.g., warnings, account suspension).
terms.section8Point1: Conditions under which accounts may be terminated.
terms.section8Point2: Steps for resolving disputes between users, instructors, or the platform.
terms.section8Point3: Governing law and jurisdiction for legal matters.
terms.section9Point1: Limitation of liability for the platform regarding course outcomes.
terms.section9Point2: Disclaimer that courses do not replace formal medical training.
terms.section9Point3: Acknowledgment that users take full responsibility for applying learned skills.
terms.section10Point1: Downtime Policy: Explain how and when the platform may be unavailable due to maintenance or technical issues.
terms.section10Point2: User Compensation: Whether users will receive compensation or extensions if the platform is down for an extended period.
terms.section11Point1: Clear Refund Conditions: Define the circumstances under which users can get a refund (e.g., dissatisfaction, course cancellation, technical failure).
terms.section11Point2: Chargebacks and Disputes: Outline how the platform handles chargebacks and disputes related to payments.
terms.section12Point1: Validity of Certificates: Clarify whether the platform's certificates are recognized by medical institutions or licensing bodies.
terms.section12Point2: Accreditation Transparency: Indicate if courses are accredited and by whom.
terms.section13Title: 13. Compliance with Medical and Educational Regulations
terms.section13Point1: Legal Compliance: Ensure the platform aligns with local medical education and privacy regulations in targeted markets (Egypt, Saudi Arabia).
terms.section13Point2: Liability for Medical Advice: Clearly state that the platform does not provide direct medical advice or replace formal education.
terms.section14Point1: User Notifications: Specify how users will receive updates, such as changes to terms, promotions, or new course releases.
terms.section14Point2: Marketing Communications: Give users the ability to opt in or out of promotional emails.
terms.section15Point1: Use of Third-Party Services: If any features rely on external platforms (e.g., payment gateways, webinar tools), explain how those work.
terms.section15Point2: Responsibility Disclaimer: Clarify that the platform is not responsible for issues caused by external services.
terms.section16Point1: Policy Update Process: Inform users how and when terms may change.
terms.section16Point2: User Agreement Requirement: Indicate whether users must accept new terms to continue using the platform.

about.title: Empowering medical professionals to develop their skills
about.description: “On this platform, doctors, students and experts share articles, exchange ideas, and provide courses and books to enhance medical skills.”
